name: 2 Old 2 Retry
description:
Created by Tiago Leitão, Zenildo da Costa e Dromus Drake (Filipe Silva), 2 Old 2 Retry is a puzzle game developed on GB Studios.

Telling the story of an Old man and is avian friend, a pigeon that he train, this pigeon being the key  to solve the puzzles that prevent you form finding a place to sleep.
